body.text:
Name : ALOK SINGH
Email : alok@ppdrillingfluids.in
Company : PETROPATH FLUIDS INDIA LTD
Telephone : 7676586855
Country : India


Message : Dear Sir,

Greetings from Petropath Fluids India Pvt. Ltd.

We are a leading drilling fluid engineering and chemical manufacturing company based in India, with operations across multiple oilfield service domains. We are currently looking to source high-quality additives for Synthetic Oil-Based Mud (SOBM) systems, including:

Primary Emulsifier

Wetting Agent

Fluid Loss Additive

Viscosifier

Kindly share your product catalog, technical data sheets, and pricing details for the above.

Looking forward to your response.

--
This e-mail was sent from https://www.matangiindustries.com/contact/
